message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd find really valuable.  I'm asking for $110 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $95. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $100 for the product.  Let's see if we can make this work!
